pages.text: Look at these beautiful horses and elephants! Who brought them here? squealed Ahilya. Reluctantly, she tore her eyes away from the beautiful animals – it would get dark soon! She hurried inside the temple and lit a lamp. Ahilya closed her eyes and bowed in prayer.
highlightQuestion: 1. Where georgle porgle went in the afternoon
2. Where georgle porgle went in the afternoon
highlightAnswer: 1.one after noon, he went to the park near his house
2.one after noon, he went to the park near his house

pages.text: Ahilya was the daughter of the village head, Mankoji Shinde. She hailed from a shepherd family. In those days, girls were not sent to school. Society considered the role of women as only managing the household and taking care of the family; educating a girl was not given importance. But Ahilya’s father thought differently and taught her to read and write. After Ahilya and Khanderao were married, Ahilya went to Indore, which was in the Malwa province, as the Holkar family’s daughter-in- law. The rest is history. She was destined to become a queen!
highlightQuestion: 1. Where georgle porgle went in the afternoon
2. Where georgle porgle went in the afternoon
highlightAnswer: 1.one after noon, he went to the park near his house
2.one after noon, he went to the park near his house

pages.text: Munu, look at this goat-kid jumping in the field, says Chunu. Look how joyful she is!
highlightQuestion: 1. Where georgle porgle went in the afternoon
2. Where georgle porgle went in the afternoon
highlightAnswer: 1.one after noon, he went to the park near his house
2.one after noon, he went to the park near his house

pages.text: Chunu, look at these flowers blooming! Munu says. Look how they sway and smile and dance in the breeze.
highlightQuestion: 1. Where georgle porgle went in the afternoon
2. Where georgle porgle went in the afternoon
highlightAnswer: 1.one after noon, he went to the park near his house
2.one after noon, he went to the park near his house

pages.text: Like a bird I fly, Going up high in the sky! calls Chunu. I'm playing with joy, jumping like a goat kid.
highlightQuestion: 1. Where georgle porgle went in the afternoon
2. Where georgle porgle went in the afternoon
highlightAnswer: 1.one after noon, he went to the park near his house
2.one after noon, he went to the park near his house

pages.text: Munu, come with me, Chunu calls. Let's fly together. Let's sit on the flowers like butterflies. Let's sing!
highlightQuestion: 1. Where georgle porgle went in the afternoon
2. Where georgle porgle went in the afternoon
highlightAnswer: 1.one after noon, he went to the park near his house
2.one after noon, he went to the park near his house

pages.text: Look, how the firefly dances! Munu says.Look at the lamp it carries.
highlightQuestion: 1. Where georgle porgle went in the afternoon
2. Where georgle porgle went in the afternoon
highlightAnswer: 1.one after noon, he went to the park near his house
2.one after noon, he went to the park near his house

pages.text: The night is gone, and the light is here. Good morning! Sleep is gone, and hunger is here. Time for breakfast.
highlightQuestion: 1. Where georgle porgle went in the afternoon
2. Where georgle porgle went in the afternoon
highlightAnswer: 1.one after noon, he went to the park near his house
2.one after noon, he went to the park near his house

pages.text: Mother says, Thuli will come. She will unleash me. Wait, my little daughter, you may then drink my milk.
highlightQuestion: 1. Where georgle porgle went in the afternoon
2. Where georgle porgle went in the afternoon
highlightAnswer: 1.one after noon, he went to the park near his house
2.one after noon, he went to the park near his house

pages.text: The sun rises and the door opens.There is Thuli, Mother. I’m hungry! says the calf.
highlightQuestion: 1. Where georgle porgle went in the afternoon
2. Where georgle porgle went in the afternoon
highlightAnswer: 1.one after noon, he went to the park near his house
2.one after noon, he went to the park near his house

pages.text: Thuli prepares the the fire to boil the feed for the cows. She hums to herself while she works.
highlightQuestion: 1. Where georgle porgle went in the afternoon
2. Where georgle porgle went in the afternoon
highlightAnswer: 1.one after noon, he went to the park near his house
2.one after noon, he went to the park near his house

pages.text: Look at these beautiful horses and elephants! Who brought them here? squealed Ahilya. Reluctantly, she tore her eyes away from the beautiful animals – it would get dark soon! She hurried inside the temple and lit a lamp. Ahilya closed her eyes and bowed in prayer.
